install:
Alias: i
Install a package
eg: npm install axios
    npm i axios
install -g:
Install a package globally
eg: npm i typescript -g
install -S:
Alias: --save
(Default)Install a package(write to the dependencies of package.json)
eg: npm i axios [-S]
install -D:
Alias: --save-dev
Install a package(write to the devDependencies of package.json)
eg: npm i sass -D
uninstall:
Uninstall a package
eg: npm uninstall axios
uninstall -g:
Uninstall a package globally
eg: npm uninstall typescript -g
update:
Update a package
eg: npm Update typescript
search:
Search for packages
eg: npm search [search terms ...]
init:
Initialize a package.json file
eg: npm init
init -y:
Alias: --yes
Initialize a package.json file(without confirm)
eg: npm init -y
init -f:
Alias: --force
Force initialize a package.json file
cache add:
Add packages cache
eg: npm cache add <package-spec>
cache clean:
Clean packages cache
eg: npm cache clean [<key>]
cache ls:
List packages cache
eg: npm cache ls [<name>@<version>]
cache Verify:
Verify package's cache
eg: npm cache verify
config:
Alias: c
Manage the npm configuration files
config set:
Set the npm configuration
eg: npm config set <key>=<value> [<key>=<value> ...]
config get:
Get the npm configuration
eg: npm config get [<key> [<key> ...]]
config delete:
Delete the npm configuration
eg: npm config delete <key> [<key> ...]
config list:
List the npm configuration
eg: npm config list [--json]
config edit:
Edit the npm configuration
eg: npm config edit
config fix:
Fix the npm configuration
eg: npm config fix
run:
run the script named <foo>
eg: npm run <foo>
-l: display usage info for all commands
-v:
Alias: --version
Print the current version of Volta
